jump_scares.spoiler: Sick-Head suddenly appears underneath the door of the toilet cubicle that Charly is hiding in
Levon bursts into the toilet cubicle startling Charly
Sick-Head grabs Levon from behind
Sick-Head returns as Charly attempts to treat Levon
Sick-Head suddenly spasms as he lies on the floor
The lady tied to the mattress suddenly moves and cries out
A hand is placed over Venus’s mouth
Doom-Head appears behind Charly
Mirroring the final jump scare from the first film, Angela is pulled back into the darkness
After Martos turns around in the apartment hallway, an infected comes running at him
Martos, now an infected, lunges at the camera
Out of nowhere, an infected boy drops down from the ceiling and grabs Larra
The infected boy suddenly jumps onto the priest’s back
When Larra turns, an infected appears in the doorway
An infected girl appears at the end of the hallway
Ori accidentally fires a gun
Ori fires a second shot
An infected suddenly jumps out from the kitchen
Infected Martos lunges at the group
A hand shoots out of the water and grabs the SWAT chief
The creature appears and starts attacking Rosso
The creature suddenly appears behind the priest and attacks him
Angela shoots Rosso
The camera suddenly cuts to the scene from the beginning of the film of Angela being dragged into the darkness
The handcuffed patient lunges forward in the bed
One of the captives gets dragged away suddenly
A man with a disfigured face comes up from behind the woman
A man’s face turns to a skeleton
The man with the crow mask’s face distorts with a loud sound in the background
Some kids throw eggs at the house and they suddenly splatter at the window
A door suddenly slams
An alien creature appears in front of the camera
The alien finds the woman hiding
The clown runs out from the side of the gas station
The clown appears in front of the woman’s car window
The woman turns the driver over to see that it’s a man with a severely disfigured face
The woman raises her head to see the clown right in front of her
The video suddenly zooms in on the clown’s face
The movie title card is displayed suddenly, accompanied by a loud noise
There is a loud thud on the tent
The bear lets out a roar and attacks the tent
The bear attacks the tent once more
As the man reaches into the water to touch the parasite, it jumps onto him
A parasite walks onto the security camera and shrieks
A shadowy figure passes the window behind James and the camera footage cuts out
An image of James with a disfigured face briefly flashes across the camera footage
A loud bang in an otherwise quiet scene may startle some people
Anne shines the torch on a figure standing in the darkness
An invisible force appears to drag Patient 11 away
Patient 11 suddenly screams and pounds on the observation window
Anne sees a mysterious figure standing by the window
There is a loud bang followed by screaming
Anne shines the torch on Callie who now has black eyes and is vomiting a red liquid
Patient 14 begins to scream and shake violently
Patient 14 suddenly appears in front of the scientist
Anne looks in the car mirror and sees Thomas’s face has turned a red color
A hand grabs Anne around the ankle as she walks up the stairs
Thomas wakes up in the back seat and yells which startles Anne
A researcher gets an electric shock
The corpse on the examination table suddenly screams and grabs the researcher around the neck
Anne looks into a hole built into the wall and a pale face with hollow eyes suddenly appears
Anne looks down a corridor and sees an alien figure coming towards her
Something begins to bang on the door
A hand with long fingers suddenly appears on the locker that Anne is hiding in
Anne turns around and sees a grotesque figure standing beside her
Anne turns around and sees her friends face has the same black eyes and deformed expression as previous victims
Teddy the bear pops up on the edge of the bed
The dollhouse bursts open
A silhouette of a demon appears in the hallway
Benny appears behind the phone
Jack slaps her across the face
A dog starts barking at the fence as Clare and Andi walk by
A scarab scuttles across the frame as the woman looks over the bed
Brief flashes to a car while Elvis is in bed
Scarab jumps suddenly at Elvis
Scarab jumps out of the bowl
Several cuts to photos as Elvis enters the room accompanied by a sound effect
Elvis is woken up by a hand grabbing him with a sound effect
The nurse turns and a man in standing right behind her
Bubba Ho-Tep attacks Elvis from behind the tree
Bubba Ho-Tep steps into frame
Meg turns around and comes face to face with her dad
A hand enters the tent, startling one of the boys sleeping in it
The clown grabs the boy’s wrist as he approaches
Meg sees a figure move past the screen on the camera footage she is reviewing
Jack touches his mother which causes her to scream
The clown appears in front of Meg
As Jack peeks out of an opening, the clown suddenly appears
A large concrete block moves across the opening
The clown rips through some floor boards causing Jack to scream
The clown suddenly stands up and runs at Meg
The apparently dead clown suddenly grabs Meg around the leg
While Faith walks through the house in a dream sequence, her father suddenly drops down from the ceiling right in front of her face
Faith looks to her side and there is a cut to some masked coven members standing in the room accompanied by a sound effect
Faith leans forwards and Sissy is revealed to be standing behind her
There is a cut with a sound effect to a masked coven member watching Amy from a window
Faith says “My son is the devil,” followed by a cut to the child and a quick zoom as his face becomes distorted
After Father Simon says “Now,” the camera pans to the left to show Alan being pulled out of a bathtub by someone and screaming
Alan is suddenly shot in the head
After Sara leaves the toilet Aaron jumps out and screams at her (as a joke)
Aaron attempts to scare Sara again as he jumps out from around a corner
Aaron opens the shower curtain in another attempt to scare Sara however she scares him first by screaming at him while wearing tape on her face
Sarah pops up in front of a window to scare Aaron
Aaron drops the camera at the base of a tree
Sara suddenly runs at Aaron while screaming
Aaron is startled by Josef while in his car
Josef surfaces from under the water in the bathtub
Aaron pulls back a curtain and is startled by a scary mask
Josef jumps out from behind a boulder and scares Aaron
Josef jumps out of a doorway and scares Aaron as he is entering the house
Josef wakes up suddenly
There is a noise
Josef starts speaking behind Aaron
Aaron is startled by a loud noise while he is in bed
Josef appears in front of the camera and lets out a scream. [Video]
A scary face flashes up on Casey’s laptop. [Video]
A silhoutte runs past the camera
A woman runs out of the darkness and shrieks
Guy’s bloody hand grabs the side of the metro door
Kate looks around the corner and there is a cut to a dog that’s barking at her
Kate touches a sleeping man, frightening him and causing him to bolt upwards
The security guard is grabbed by the killer from behind
Jimmy is grabbed by the killer from above
A dead body rises from the water
Kate turns the flashlight back on and the killer is right in front of the camera. (No accompanying sound.
A cup on the table suddenly moves on its own
As Graham reaches for the cup it suddenly flies off the table
The pictures on the wall suddenly fall off on their own
Erin moves to reveal a ghost woman standing right behind her
As the vlogger approaches a hole in a bricked up wall to investigate a noise, a bird suddenly flies out
Erin screams at something and the camera rotates to reveal the ghost woman standing right behind Graham
As the cameraman approaches a doll it suddenly jumps out at him
Graham begins to nudge the sheets on the floor with his foot when the sheets suddenly fly up in the figure of the ghost woman
As Graham approaches a room, the ghost woman becomes visible in the corner, which startles him
Graham slowly moves into the room when the ghost woman suddenly runs out from behind the corner and towards the camera
The ghost woman’s hands suddenly break out of the wall and grab Graham
Graham points the camera at the door which suddenly slams on its own
Graham opens the door to reveal the ghost woman standing right behind it as she lunges out at him
Graham turns around and the ghost woman is right behind him
A woman dressed in white appears beside Frank’s car window
Laura pokes at a skull on the wall and it falls to the floor, startling her
Brad peeks at the baby and discovers that it is dead
Richard gets out of the car to investigate the baby’s pram on the road, as he looks in he pretends to be pulled into the carriage and eaten
There is a loud noise and the car shakes as a tire blows out
There is a sudden bump as the car hits something
Frank lights a match and the woman in white is standing right behind him
The silhouette of someone appears at the window beside Marion
Marion turns around and runs into the woman in white
The kid’s toy begins to yell in an adult voice
The phone suddenly rings as Jake reaches for it
The car that Dan and his wife are in is suddenly hit by another car
The bin explodes as Emelie opens it
There is a sudden noise in the distance
As the group look around the room with a flashlight, there is suddenly a cut to a creepy old man behind some shelves who turns at the camera with a sound cue
Paulina leans in towards the seemingly dead creepy old man, who suddenly grabs her the shoulder
A sudden, very loud noise scares the entire group
Claire approaches Dave in bed before disappearing. When, Dave turns around, she is right in front of his face
While walking backwards, Alan runs into the creepy old man
The soldier touches the seemingly dead man with a knife, and he springs back up
Alan turns around, shining the light on the creepy old man who is standing right in front of him
As Paulina slowly reaches out for her son’s shoulder, he quickly turns around
The son runs at Paulina, briefly going out of frame. When he reappears, his face shifts and he begins attacking Paulina
There is a sudden earthquake
A closet door closes on its own, revealing Claire with a knife behind it
Claire appears on screen and screams as she attacks the camera
A sudden scream is heard in the distance
As Tyler and Paulina walk into the dark corridor, there is a gasping sound right in front of them
The camera’s night vision shows a woman right in front of Tyler and Paulina who looks up at the camera and screams
The water begins to bubble, scaring Paulina
Paulina looks up from the ground and sees her son right in front of her, who then screams
Paulina stands up, and there is a rotting corpse right in front of her face
Paulina looks down from the ceiling with the flashlight and shines it on Pepe
Mike Myers climbs onto a car roof
A hand reaches through a window to grab lady
A hand smashes through car window
A silhouette watches Laurie walk away from the house
Tommy runs into Myers while at school
Laurie runs into Sheriff Brackett
A window smashes
Myers steps out from a car
Myers appears behind Annie in the car
A shadow crosses the bed while Lynda and Bob are in it
Bob opens door and is attacked by Myers
Dead Bob swings upside down from a door frame
Myers pops up from behind a sofa
A pumpkin is thrown at the door
A loud noise is heard in the conversation
After the man in the red cape stands in front of the gate, the door behind Harper suddenly opens with a loud bang
The advertising sign on the left in the picture suddenly goes on after a long camera movement
After Evan laughs and turns around, a fake skeleton shoots into the picture with a loud scream from the right corner and frightens him
A big spider crawls through the opening. Suddenly there is a bang and hundreds of small spiders fall into the room
Nathan puts his hand in the hole to help Bailey find her ring. His hand suddenly gets pulled further in
When Harper looks at the door with the Emergency Exit sign, something from the other side hits this
Smoke comes out of the shaft under Nathan and frightens him
As Angela reaches through the fence for the crowbar, someone suddenly steps on her hand. It is teased relatively long, but the impact is still quite effective
The fake skeleton scares Evan again
Since the last 20 minutes scenes have been set up very often without any real jump scare. Here someone bangs on the door as Harper hides under the bed and tries to solve the house puzzle
A shotgun suddenly shoots through the door where The End is
The shotgun shoots again in a quiet scene
The unmasked man is suddenly shot as he squats by the box
Clown face appears behind Harper’s mother as she hugs her
The camera rounds a corner to see a clown figure standing in the hallway
A scary-looking clown’s head is suddenly looking straight at the camera
A clown figure is seen standing in a doorway at the bottom of stairs
Bedcovers are lifted to reveal a  girl’s bloody face
The camera turns back to reveal scary clown mannequins sitting on the ground
A black figure standing behind a girl suddenly moves towards the camera, while screams are heard
There is suddenly a loud sound as someone creeps through the house
After a loud noise, Julian turns around and George is standing right behind him at the doorframe
George turns on a light switch, revealing something in the basement that screeches and runs away
As George reaches out for a girl, her hand suddenly reaches out and grabs him
In a “false awakening” jump scare, George wakes up and turns to his side, and the girl suddenly jumps out at him
The car crash suddenly explodes into flames

movies.title: I Am Not a Serial Killer

jump_scares.spoiler: A woman is suddenly hit by a car while crossing the road
Mrs. Crowley calls out in her sleep
Accompanied by a sound effect, Mr. Crowley bursts into the house
A sudden cut to a closeup of the zombie’s face in a flashback
Buzzer’s severed head suddenly opens eyes
The church employee taps Noddy on the shoulder from behind, startling him
The motorcycle suddenly traps the priest’s fingers
The surface of the motorcycle’s fuel tank reacts to holy water
The motorcycle breaks through the window
Accompanied by a high pitched noise, the lamp flickers and the scene abruptly changes
There is a sudden scene change to a man attacking a woman
There is another abrupt scene change
A loud scream can be heard
A torch shines on Susan as she walks towards the camera with an unnaturally wide smile on her face, as she gets closer her face suddenly appears directly in front of the camera. [Video]
A crack of thunder may startle some viewers
There is an abrupt cut to a man hitting a woman
Nikki shoots “The Phantom” several times, his face is then replaced with a disturbing image of Nikki’s own face. [Video]
A cult member runs at Jay
The face from Alice’s phone footage suddenly comes towards the camera. [Video]
During a very tense scene, Angela slowly approaches three mannequins by a window when one of them makes a hissing noise and briefly transforms into a person
An old man walks around the corner startling Jackson
During a tense scene, Angela turns around to see Elliot right beside her
A girl runs past the screen in the foreground
After Jackson says “Beth” one of the young girls appears in front of Jackson and Angela
Beth’s bloodied body appears by the window
A figure moves past the screen in front of Angela
A hand is placed on Angela’s shoulder
The lid of a barrel is removed to reveal a decomposed corpse
As the cameraman slowly looks around the garage, he sees the landlord standing in the darkness and reaching out for him
While the cameraman walks through the dark alleyway, a pane of glass shatters by itself

movies.title: My Heart Can’t Beat Unless You Tell It To

jump_scares.spoiler: Jessie shoves the table suddenly and storms off
(Night #5) Katie suddenly wakes up out of bed gasping for air
(Night #5) The noise of something banging comes from another room
(Night #13) The couple wake up in their bed and a loud noise sounds from another room, followed by a bang
(Night #15) Micah enters the house again where he hears a bang
(Night #18) The bedroom door slams shut
(Night #18) The door slams shut again
Something bangs upstairs
(Night #21) Katie begins to scream loudly
(Night #21) Micah’s body is hurled at the screen from the doorway. (theatrical version) [Video]
(Night #21) Katie crawls up to the screen and lunges at it as her face begins to turn demonic. (theatrical version) [Video]
A shadowy figure suddenly appears on Sami’s car’s back seat
Sami’s car radio comes on
Sami’s car radio comes on, again
As Sami shuts the hood of her car, an shadow of a figure unexpectedly appears on it
As Sami turns around, a man with a bloodied face suddenly appears in her car’s back seat
Accompanied by a sound cue, a figure suddenly appears in a dark doorway
A brick is thrown through a window accompanied by the sound of glass breaking
The scene abruptly cuts to a man struggling in a cage trap
After Zepp’s eye is revealed in Daina’s closet, the closet doors slam open
A masked man lunges at Dr. Gordon while he is on phone
A toy begins making laughing noises behind Adam
Adam’s camera flashes to reveal a masked man hiding in a cupboard
Dr. Gordon is electrocuted while he is sobbing on the floor
The girl bangs her hand on the glass door
Asakawa suddenly jumps up from the table in anger
A strange girl tapping on a window may startle some viewers
A man in a sleeping bag yells out as Mike shines his torch on him
There is suddenly a loud flash of several spooky images accompanied by a loud sound effect
Oz has a vision where he sees a clone of himself slowly approaching him. Suddenly, there is a cut to the clone’s face as he begins to scream
There is a sudden flash of Oz’s clone screaming
A loud buzzing noise wakes everyone up
Britton pulls the front door curtain, and a wolf-like creature jumps at the window
Cameron walks towards the corner of the attic and a bat flies out at him
The lights turn back on and a tall monster is standing right in front of the camera
The wolf creature walks away as Cameron gets closer to the car window. Suddenly, it runs back to the car and hits it
Alicia’s boyfriend appears behind the car window and bangs on it, startling her
As Alicia slowly reaches her hand towards the old man’s dead body, there is a sudden thud that scares her and makes her pull her hand back
Alicia’s phone suddenly starts ringing during a quiet scene
While Alicia is looking out the peephole, the killer’s axe suddenly slams into the door from the side
Alicia peeks downwards from the ledge and there is suddenly a cut to the killer lighting a flare in front of her
The seemingly dead killer suddenly springs back up and grabs Alicia on the ankle
The disfigured woman suddenly attacks the TV host
Tara backs into a woman standing behind her
After standing motionless for several seconds, the clown suddenly runs after Tara
Accompanied by a sound effect, the clown suddenly looks towards where Tara is hiding
The clown stabs Tara in the leg
After Tara yells “Mister!”, the clown grabs her from behind
The clown lifts the hammer and lunges at Tara causing her to flinch
The clown again lunges at Tara with the hammer
The pest exterminator turns around and almost walks into a woman standing behind him
The clown (disguised as Tara), suddenly sits up behind Vicky
The clown appears in front of the peep hole that Vicky is looking through
During a tense scene, a mop falls out of a bucket creating a loud noise
The clown suddenly places some plastic wrap over Vicky’s face
There is a sudden cut to Tara’s mutilated corpse
The clown appears through a door and attacks the pest exterminator
The clown reaches through a gap in the doors to grab Vicky
There is a loud noise and the lights start to flicker
The clown grabs the coroner by the neck

movies.title: The Babadook – Original Australian Blu-Ray at 25fps

There is a loud thump followed by a scream

As Gloria approaches the car, she is attacked from behind
Behind Thomas there is suddenly a man in a mask
From the dark corner of the room a screaming man suddenly shoots out

The scene jump cuts from Vicki practicing her gun shooting skills to a champagne bottle popping and the sorority girls screaming in excitement
Mrs. Slater’s scares Vicki and her boyfriend making out and uses her cane to slashes the waterbed
Stevie kicks a chain in the dark boiler room beneath the pool and startles herself
As Stevie steadies the swinging lightbulb a hand grab her neck and forces her against the wall
Diane frightens Jeanie in the garden looking for Mrs. Slater
The attic door in the ceiling opens and Morgan screams as the camera rushes towards her
As the Jack-in-the-Box stops spinning the killer runs Mrs. Slater’s cane through her back
Katey is started when she turns around in the attic after discovering a clown costume resembling the Jack-in-the-Box
Diane jumps when an object falls from the van’s dashboard
A hand and Mrs. Slater’s cane come in through the van’s sunroof and attack Diane
Discovering Liz dead in the van, Vicki turns around terrified to see a figure wielding Mrs. Slater’s cane
The murder in the clown mask opens his eyes, and the movie ends
A man’s hand suddenly appears inside Megan’s car holding a cigarette lighter. [Video]
Samantha is startled by the doorbell as she climbs the stairs
A loud thump can be heard on the other side of the attic door

Will slaps the gun out of Pruitt’s hand

Gayson suddenly jumps out of his seat and lunges over the table
Gayson runs up to the car from outside and loudly bangs on the window
One of the men bangs his hand on the car window to scare the others as a joke
An alien runs out into the road in front of the motorcycle
The cameraman turns around and an alien runs across the field near them
The boarded window suddenly explodes and an alien reaches in and grabs one of the men
There is a sudden explosion outside
The cameraman turns around and an alien crashes through the boards and begins chasing them

An alien foot stomps down in front of the camera
The man behind the camera hits the little girl with it
Ed hits the driving man with something
The lights turn on to reveal Ed’s reflection in the window, startling Tim
There is a loud cut to a dead body
A man breaks through a door
Accompanied by a sound effect, a masked figure appears on the previously black screen
Accompanied by a sound effect, Allison ducks down to reveal Dr. Powell watching her from the doorway
A man is shown with his neck suddenly cut open
The lights cut out suddenly
Maggie has a sudden vision of a grotesque creature which causes her to fall backwards in fear
The creature’s foot stamps on the ground
Simon opens a door and Kim rushes out
A sudden scene change to toast popping out of a toaster might startle some viewers
There is a second explosion (much louder and more violent than the initial one)
During a dream sequence a hand suddenly breaks through the window in front of Shideh
A figure moves past in the reflection of the window
Shideh looks through the peep hole in the door and sees a figure pass quickly through the hallway
Shideh sees a floating figure on the stairs
The floating spectre suddenly appears close to the camera
“Dorsa” looks up to reveal it is not her but an entity with a large set of teeth
The floating spectre suddenly grabs Dorsa
The running woman stops to catch her breath, and as the camera begins to spin around her she is suddenly hit with a club
Nacho jumps out from behind a door as a joke
A club suddenly breaks the front window of the car
The killer drops down to the ground and looks at Vasco
A car’s headlights suddenly turn on in the background
As the friends zoom in on the dead body on Google maps, the killer suddenly turns up and faces the camera
After a few seconds of silenty zooming in on the killer, a phone suddenly starts vibrating, scaring the group
The killer unexpectedly jumps out of a garbage can
The car’s back camera turns on to reveal the killer standing outside
The camera turns back on to reveal the killer now standing right in front of it
The killer jumps out from the back seat and grabs Phil
Fiona approaches a door curtain to peek at the other side and it’s suddenly pulled open
There is a sudden pounding on the door
Hank suddenly shouts “I’m sorry.” While not a jump scare, it is sudden and extremely loud, enough to clip the microphone
Emma puts the camera down and as she moves out of the center point, the Slenderman is revealed to be standing right behind her
As Emma backs out of the school driveway, Chase points the camera at the Slenderman standing behind the building, followed by the camera glitching and an extremely loud yell
Hank turns around to look at Danny and the Slenderman is standing right behind him
A stack of hay suddenly falls in front of Emma
Emma turns around and the Slenderman is standing behind her
Chase shines the phone’s flashlight on the Slenderman
Kyle suddenly fires the gun
All of the screens suddenly turn into a close-up of the Slenderman
